page.title: 11POLITICS:WENHAM AND RAYDON
page.content: The local Liberal Association was formed in 1981 originally as part of the Sudbury and Woodbridge constituency but following boundary changes is now part of the South Suffolk constituency. The liberal association is very active on local issues with campaigns to improve street lighting, pavements, safety on school buses and dangerous road junctions.This has been particularly important in the area as increased road traffic on the A12 has caused hazards where it has intersections with minor roads.Fund-raising and social events re held regularly to fund county,distict and parish council elections.Also a newsletter called Focus is produced twice a yearnd and delivered to every household in the area.
